}}
{{dcl end}}

Checks whether the pointed-to object is a FIFO or pipe file. Effectively returns:
@1@ {{c|std::filesystem::is_fifo(status())}}.
@2@ {{c|std::filesystem::is_fifo(status(ec))}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|ec|out-parameter for error reporting in the non-throwing overload}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{c|true}} if the referred-to filesystem object is a FIFO or pipe file, {{c|false}} otherwise.
